title: Group Anagrams
algorithmDescription: Group anagrams together using hash table with sorted string keys
detailedDescription: Group anagrams from list of strings. Anagrams are words formed by rearranging letters. Input: First line has n (number of strings), next n lines have one string each. Output: Groups of anagrams (each group on separate line). Use hash table with sorted string as key for efficiency.
hints: Anagrams have same letters when sorted
Use sorted string as hash key
Hash table maps sorted string to list of original strings
All strings with same sorted form are anagrams
commonMistakes: Comparing every string with every other (O(n²))
solutionApproach: Create hash table. For each string: sort its characters to create key, add original string to list at that key. After processing all strings, output each group from hash table.
testCaseCriteria: Must correctly group all anagrams. Should handle various string lengths. Time complexity better than O(n²).
